name: ledger-dev-tools
description: Tools to accelerate development of apps for Ledger devices.

viewsWelcome.contents:
No Ledger app detected in the workspace.
Open a Ledger app's folder or open a workspace containing Ledger apps to enable this extension's features.
[Open App Folder](command:vscode.openFolder)
[Open Workspace](command:workbench.action.openWorkspace)

commands.title: Select device
commands.tooltip: Select the device you want to build your app for.

commands.title: Select app
commands.tooltip: Select the app you want to build.

commands.title: Add test dependencies
commands.tooltip: Add additional test dependencies to install for selected app.

ledgerDevTools.onboardingSeed.default: glory promote mansion idle axis finger extra february uncover one trip resource lawn turtle enact monster seven myth punch hobby comfort wild raise skin
ledgerDevTools.onboardingSeed.markdownDescription: Device quick onboarding default 24-word Seed phrase.

ledgerDevTools.additionalDepsPerApp.description: Additional dependencies to install for each app.

ledgerDevTools.keepContainerTerminal.markdownDescription: Keep the Terminal window opened after a successful Container Update.

ledgerDevTools.containerUpdateRetries.markdownDescription: Max number of Container Update retries.

ledgerDevTools.userScpPrivateKey.markdownDescription: Use the host's `SCP_PRIVKEY` environment variable when loading/deleting app on device. Cf. https://developers.ledger.com/docs/embedded-app/pin-bypass.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
